entry.title: Ordinals BIP PR
entry.summary: The email discusses the purpose of BIPs (Bitcoin Improvement Proposals) and questions why they cannot be published on individual web pages instead of being maintained in a central repository. The sender agrees that people can maintain their own BIPs in their respective repositories. The email also mentions the inclusion of all BIPs that are not maintained in the "bitcoin/bips" repository on the "bips.wiki" website. The email is signed off with the sender's name and mentions that it was sent using Proton Mail secure email.
